Questions: I have requested my transcripts to be sent to Crowley's Ridge College.
My counselor told me that my transcripts have been sent.
I have requested my Final Transcripts to be sent to CRC. (This must be done after graduation)
responsefromquestionpicked: Thank you. When they are received and processed, you will be notified.

Questions: My counselor told me that my Final Transcripts have already been sent.
responsefromquestionpicked: Thank you. When they are received and processed, you will be notified

Questions: I don't know anyone currently enrolled at CRC or any incoming Freshmen.
responsefromquestionpicked: The Admissions department will find you a roommate. You will be given that person's information this summer.

Questions: I know who I would like my roommate to be.
responsefromquestionpicked: Please write the name of the person with which you would like to room.

Questions: I have completed the FAFSA and it has been sent to CRC
responsefromquestionpicked: Thank you. It will take a few days for us to receive it. We will post the information as soon as we can.

Questions: I have not completed the FAFSA
responsefromquestionpicked: You need have it completed by the deadline of July 14th.

Questions: I have questions about the FAFSA
responsefromquestionpicked: Please contact the Financial Director, David Goff, at your earliest convience 870-236-6901.

Questions: I am in the process of requesting official transcripts from these colleges/universities.
responsefromquestionpicked: If you are currently enrolled in a college/university, wait until you have completed the current semester before having them sent.

Questions: I have requested official transcripts from these colleges
responsefromquestionpicked: If you are currently enrolled in a college/university, wait until you have completed the current semester before having them sent.

Questions: I am taking dual enrollment/concurrent credit classes from this college/university.
responsefromquestionpicked: Remember to have a final transcript sent to CRC after you graduate/complete the semester.

Questions: I'm a Junior in high school. Do I need to send my transcripts now?
responsefromquestionpicked: No. Take as many classes as you desire, after you are finished taking your last class as a Senior, then have your transcripts sent to CRC.

Questions: I have sent a check/cash in the mail.
responsefromquestionpicked: When the Admissions department receives it, it will be credited to your account.

Questions: I would like to pay via credit/debit card
responsefromquestionpicked: Please contact Sonia Johnson in the Business office. She can run your card for you.
